sentences.sContent: The band were spurred on by the success of their last two singles.
sentences.sCn: 乐队因最近两张单曲唱片的成功而深受鼓舞。

sentences.sContent: It was an article in the local newspaper which finally spurred him into action .
sentences.sCn: 是当地报纸上的一篇文章最终促使他行动起来。

trans.tranCn: 刺激， 激励； 用马刺刺马
trans.tranOther: to encourage someone or make them want to do something
